original_text:
By all this we are encouraged.
In addition to our own encouragement, we were especially delighted to see how happy Titus was, because his spirit has been refreshed by all of you.
korean_text: 이로 말미암아 우리가 위로를 받았고 우리가 받은 위로 위에 디도의 기쁨으로 우리가 더욱 많이 기뻐함은 그의 마음이 너희 무리로 말미암아 안심함을 얻었음이라

sentences.original_text: By all this we are encouraged
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 것으로 우리는 격려를 받습니다

sentences.original_text: In addition to our own encouragement
we were especially delighted to see
because his spirit has been refreshed
